comments.raw_text:
Having an option to hide the old cert-chain building declarations will help find places inside NSS that need to be changed for an application to use only libpkix. 

I propose a build environment variable NSS_ENABLE_OLD_CERT_CHAIN_API (default 1) that controls a same-named macro that can be used in #ifdefs that control the declarations in the public API header files of these functions. The flag would not control whether or not these functions are *defined* or exported from the shared libraries.
